import React, {Component} from 'react'; import MoreOptionsBase from './MoreOptionsBase'; import MoreOptionsBonus from './MoreOptionsBonus'; import MoreOptionsEquity from './MoreOptionsEquity'; import MoreOptionsPerks from './MoreOptionsPerks'; export class CalculatorControls extends Component{ render() { return (
${parseInt(props.baseSalary)} props.setbaseSalary(event.target.value) }/>
${parseInt(props.bonusAmount)} props.setbonusAmount(event.target.value) }/>
${parseInt(props.equityValue)} props.setequityValue(event.target.value) }/>
${props.perksValue} props.setperksValue(event.target.value) }/>
); } }
